price: İbrahim: "O halde Allah’ı bırakıp da size hiç bir şekilde fayda ya da zarar vermeyen şeylere mi ibadet ediyorsunuz?" dedi.
arabic: قَالَ أَفَتَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَنفَعُكُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا يَضُرُّكُمۡ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla afataʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi mā lā yanfaʿukum shayan walā yaḍurrukum
